trans-unit.source: Contains a reference to a conceptual model and a data source connection.
trans-unit.target: 包含对概念模型和数据源连接的引用。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> out of sync with their metadata, EntityConnection must lock its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免无意使对象如<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>EntityConnection 必须其元数据失去同步，锁定其元数据。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked.
trans-unit.target: 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。

trans-unit.source: The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - The EntityConnection instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor, which accepts a connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案:-通过默认的构造函数，或通过构造 EntityConnection 实例<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29>构造函数，它接受连接字符串。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> locks the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>或<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A>锁定元数据。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The EntityConnection instance is constructed through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> constructor, which accepts a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 通过<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>构造函数，这样便可以接受的<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>和一种<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection></xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace></xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>构造-EntityConnection 实例

trans-unit.source: In this case, the metadata is locked at construction time.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，在构造时锁定元数据。

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are ever allowed.
trans-unit.target: 曾经不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。

trans-unit.source: When metadata is loaded, the EntityConnection verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.
trans-unit.target: 加载元数据后，EntityConnection 验证概念模型、 存储模型和映射文件全部存在。

trans-unit.source: For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅[使用 EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> out of sync with their metadata, <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> must lock its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免无意使对象如<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>其元数据失去同步<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>必须锁定其元数据。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked.
trans-unit.target: 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。

trans-unit.source: The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor, which accepts a connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案:-<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>通过默认的构造函数，或通过构造实例<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29>构造函数，它接受连接字符串。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> locks the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>或<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A>锁定元数据。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> constructor, which accepts a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>通过<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>构造函数，这样便可以接受的<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>和一种<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection></xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace></xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>构造实例</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>-

trans-unit.source: In this case the metadata is locked at construction time.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下在构造时锁定元数据。

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are ever allowed.
trans-unit.target: 曾经不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。

trans-unit.source: When metadata is loaded, the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.
trans-unit.target: 加载元数据后，<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>验证概念模型、 存储模型和映射文件是否全部存在。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅[使用 EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> class, based on the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>类，基于连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The generate a named connection string that is stored in the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 生成应用程序的配置文件中存储的已命名的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: This named connection string can be supplied in place of the `connectionString` parameter when you instantiate the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> class.
trans-unit.target: 可以提供此已命名的连接字符串来代替了`connectionString`参数时实例化<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>类。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: To avoid inadvertently putting objects <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> out of sync with their metadata, <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> must lock its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免无意使对象<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>其元数据失去同步<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>必须锁定其元数据。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked.
trans-unit.target: 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。

trans-unit.source: The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through this constructor (EntityConnection), which accepts a connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案:-<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>通过默认的构造函数，或通过此构造函数 (EntityConnection)，它接受连接字符串构造实例。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> locks the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>或<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A>锁定元数据。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> constructor, which accepts a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>通过<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>构造函数，这样便可以接受的<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>和一种<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection></xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace></xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>构造实例</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>-

trans-unit.source: The provider-specific connection string.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序特定的连接字符串中。

trans-unit.source: An invalid connection string keyword has been provided, or a required connection string keyword has not been provided.
trans-unit.target: 提供了无效的连接字符串关键字，或未提供所需的连接字符串关键字。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> class with a specified <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> and <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>与指定的类<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref>和<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor enables you to create an <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> from metadata that is not from a file on a disk or from an embedded resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数可用于创建<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>从不从磁盘上的文件或程序集中嵌入资源的元数据。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> out of sync with their metadata, the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> must lock its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免无意使对象如<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>其元数据失去同步<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>必须锁定其元数据。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked.
trans-unit.target: 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。

trans-unit.source: The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor, which accepts a connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案:-<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>通过默认的构造函数，或通过构造实例<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29>构造函数，它接受连接字符串。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> locks the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>或<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A>锁定元数据。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through this constructor (EntityConnection), which accepts a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>通过此构造函数 (EntityConnection)，这样便可以接受的<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>和一种<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection></xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>构造实例</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>-

trans-unit.source: In this case the metadata is locked at construction time.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下在构造时锁定元数据。

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are ever allowed.
trans-unit.target: 曾经不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。

trans-unit.source: When metadata is loaded, the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.
trans-unit.target: 加载元数据后，<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>验证概念模型、 存储模型和映射文件是否全部存在。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> to be associated with this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"> </xref>要与此关联<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The underlying data source connection for this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 基础数据源连接此<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The workspace or connection parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The workspace or connection parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The conceptual model is missing from the workspace.
trans-unit.target: 概念模型找不到从工作区。

trans-unit.source: -or- The mapping file is missing from the workspace.
trans-unit.target: -或者-从工作区中找不的映射文件。

trans-unit.source: -or- The storage model is missing from the workspace.
trans-unit.target: -或者-存储模型是从工作区中缺失。

trans-unit.source: -or- The connection is not in a closed state.
trans-unit.target: -或- connection 不处于关闭状态。

trans-unit.source: The connection is not from an ADO.NET Entity Framework-compatible provider.
trans-unit.target: connection 不是来自 ADO.NET 实体框架兼容提供程序。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Begins a transaction by using the underlying provider.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用基础提供程序开始一个事务。

trans-unit.source: The BeginTransaction method uses the <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> transaction isolation level.
trans-unit.target: BeginTransaction 方法使用<xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel>事务隔离级别。</xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel>

trans-unit.source: To specify a different isolation level, call <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定不同的隔离级别，调用<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value might be interpreted differently by different underlying providers.
trans-unit.target: 此值的不同的基础提供程序可能以不同的方式进行解释。

trans-unit.source: If you want your application to be portable across multiple providers, it should explicitly specify the transaction isolation level by calling <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望您的应用程序可以跨多个提供程序移植，它显式指定事务隔离级别通过调用<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: At any particular moment there can be no more than one active transaction that was created through BeginTransaction.
trans-unit.target: 任何特定时刻都可以有多个通过 BeginTransaction 已创建的活动事务。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to call any of the BeginTransaction overloads on an <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> that already has a current transaction results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>已具有当前事务中<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException></xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>上调用任何 BeginTransaction 重载

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref> instance can later be associated with the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref> to execute the command under that transaction.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref>实例更高版本与关联<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref>以执行该事务下的命令。

trans-unit.source: The underlying provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: 基础提供程序未知。

trans-unit.source: -or- The call to BeginTransaction was made on an <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> that already has a current transaction.
trans-unit.target: -或-上进行到 BeginTransaction 调用<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>已具有当前事务。

trans-unit.source: -or- The state of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> is not <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -的状态<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>不<xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Begins a transaction with the specified isolation level by using the underlying provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用基础提供程序，开始指定的隔离级别的事务。

trans-unit.source: At any particular moment there can be no more than one active transaction that was created through <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 任何特定时刻可以有多个通过<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>已创建的活动事务

trans-unit.source: An attempt to call any of the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> overloads on an <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> that already has a current transaction results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试调用任何<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A><xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>已具有当前事务中<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException></xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>重载</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The isolation level of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 事务隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref> instance can later be associated with the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref> to execute the command under that transaction.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref>实例更高版本与关联<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref>以执行该事务下的命令。

trans-unit.source: The underlying provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: 基础提供程序未知。

trans-unit.source: -or- The call to <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction*> was made on an <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> that already has a current transaction.
trans-unit.target: -调用<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction*>进行<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>已具有当前事务。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction*>

trans-unit.source: -or- The state of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> is not <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -的状态<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>不<xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: The ChangeDatabase method is required when deriving from <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 从<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>派生时需要 ChangeDatabase 方法

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported and will raise a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不受支持，将引发一种<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: When the method is called.
trans-unit.target: 当调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Closes the connection to the database.
trans-unit.target: 关闭到数据库的连接。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying data provider is not known, the call to Close does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础数据提供程序未知，则给 Close 调用没有任何影响。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when closing the connection.
trans-unit.target: 关闭连接时出错。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> connection string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The connection string required to establish the initial connection to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 建立到数据源的初始连接所需的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: On a closed connection, the currently set value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 关闭连接时，当前设置返回值。

trans-unit.source: If no value has been set, an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不设置任何值，则返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the ConnectionString property after the [EntityConnection](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)’s <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> was initialized.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置后的 ConnectionString 属性[EntityConnection](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)的<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref>已初始化。

trans-unit.source: The [MetadataWorkspace](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) is initialized either when the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError"></xref> instance is constructed through the overload that takes a <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError"></xref> as a parameter, or when the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> instance has been opened.
trans-unit.target: [MetadataWorkspace](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)是时，初始化<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError"></xref>通过采用的重载构造实例<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError"></xref>作为参数，或当<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>打开实例。

trans-unit.source: An invalid connection string keyword has been provided or a required connection string keyword has not been provided.
trans-unit.target: 提供了无效的连接字符串关键字，或未提供所需的连接字符串关键字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of seconds to wait when attempting to establish a connection before ending the attempt and generating an error.
trans-unit.target: 获取在尝试建立连接到结束尝试并生成错误时要等待的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Returns zero if the underlying data provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础数据提供程序未知，则返回零。

trans-unit.source: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.
trans-unit.target: （以秒为单位） 的时间等待连接打开。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the underlying data provider's default time-out.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为基础数据提供程序的默认超时值。

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of an <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref>, with the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand.Connection*> set to this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"> </xref>，与<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand.Connection*>设置为此<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand.Connection*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the underlying data provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: 不知道基础数据提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current database, or the database that will be used after a connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前数据库中，或打开连接后将使用的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: For the specific keyword value, such as `Database`, that maps to the Database property, see the documentation for the underlying data provider.
trans-unit.target: 对于特定的关键字值中，如`Database`，映射到数据库属性，请参阅基础数据提供程序的文档。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] equivalent keywords, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]等效关键字，请参阅的文档<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>属性。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Database" name="Database" href=""></xref> property of the underlying data provider.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Database" name="Database" href=""></xref>的基础数据提供程序的属性。

trans-unit.source: The underlying data provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: 基础数据提供程序未知。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name or network address of the data source to connect to.
trans-unit.target: 获取要连接到的数据源的名称或网络地址。

trans-unit.source: For the specific keyword value, such as `DataSource`, that maps to the DataSource property, see the documentation for the underlying data provider.
trans-unit.target: 对于特定的关键字值中，如`DataSource`，映射到数据源属性，请参阅基础数据提供程序的文档。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] equivalent keywords, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]等效关键字，请参阅的文档<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>属性。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The underlying data provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: 基础数据提供程序未知。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Enlists this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> in the specified transaction.
trans-unit.target: 登记此<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>中指定的事务。

trans-unit.source: This method forwards the call to the data source connection to explicitly enlist in the passed <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法转发对数据源连接的调用中传递<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>.</xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>显式登记

trans-unit.source: The transaction object to enlist into.
trans-unit.target: 要到登记的事务对象。

trans-unit.source: The state of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> is not <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 状态<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>不<xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> is automatically created when the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> class is created.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>时自动创建<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>创建类。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>

trans-unit.source: The creation process might throw metadata-specific exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 创建过程可能会引发特定元数据异常。

trans-unit.source: Metadata is loaded into memory and an Entity Data Model (EDM) application uses that metadata to access information about the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 元数据加载到内存并有关基础数据源的实体数据模型 (EDM) 应用程序使用访问信息的元数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ADO.NET Metadata](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/196097a5-a791-4ac4-9e6a-805685d481d5).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ADO.NET 元数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/196097a5-a791-4ac4-9e6a-805685d481d5)。

trans-unit.source: To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> out of sync with their metadata, <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> must lock its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免无意使对象如<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>其元数据失去同步<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>必须锁定其元数据。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked.
trans-unit.target: 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。

trans-unit.source: The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor, which accepts a connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案:-<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>通过默认的构造函数，或通过构造实例<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29>构造函数，它接受连接字符串。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In either case the connection string may be changed multiple times before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> locks the metadata.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>或<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A>锁定元数据。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A></xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> constructor, which accepts a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>通过<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>构造函数，这样便可以接受的<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>和一种<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection></xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace></xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>构造实例</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>-

trans-unit.source: In this case the metadata is locked at construction time.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下在构造时锁定元数据。

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are ever allowed.
trans-unit.target: 曾经不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。

trans-unit.source: When metadata is loaded, the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.
trans-unit.target: 加载元数据后，<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>验证概念模型、 存储模型和映射文件是否全部存在。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"> </xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The inline connection string contains an invalid <xref uid="langword_csharp_Metadata" name="Metadata" href=""></xref> keyword value.
trans-unit.target: 内联连接字符串包含无效<xref uid="langword_csharp_Metadata" name="Metadata" href=""></xref>关键字值。

trans-unit.source: Establishes a connection to the data source by calling the underlying data provider's<xref uid="langword_csharp_ Open" name=" Open" href=""></xref> method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用基础数据提供程序的建立到数据源的连接<xref uid="langword_csharp_ Open" name=" Open" href=""></xref>方法。

trans-unit.source: To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> out of sync with their metadata, <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> must lock its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免无意使对象如<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>其元数据失去同步<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>必须锁定其元数据。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked.
trans-unit.target: 锁定元数据后，不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。

trans-unit.source: The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor, which accepts a connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下面是锁定元数据的两种方案:-<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>通过默认的构造函数，或通过构造实例<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29>构造函数，它接受连接字符串。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下连接字符串可能在打开连接前进行多次更改。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> locks the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>或<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A>锁定元数据。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> constructor, which that accepts a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>通过构造实例<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>构造函数，它接受的<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>和一种<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In this case the metadata is locked at construction time.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下在构造时锁定元数据。

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are ever allowed.
trans-unit.target: 曾经不允许对连接字符串做出任何更改。

trans-unit.source: When metadata is loaded, the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.
trans-unit.target: 加载元数据后，<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>验证概念模型、 存储模型和映射文件是否全部存在。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when you open the connection, or the name of the underlying data provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: 当你打开该连接，或不知道基础数据提供程序的名称，就会出错。

trans-unit.source: The inline connection string contains an invalid <xref uid="langword_csharp_Metadata" name="Metadata" href=""></xref> keyword value.
trans-unit.target: 内联连接字符串包含无效<xref uid="langword_csharp_Metadata" name="Metadata" href=""></xref>关键字值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the version of the data source to which the client is connected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，包含客户端连接到数据源的版本。

trans-unit.source: The version of the data source that is contained in the provider connection string.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序连接字符串中包含的数据源版本。

trans-unit.source: The connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 连接已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref> property of the underlying provider if the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> is open.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>的基础提供程序的属性如果<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>处于打开状态。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, returns <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 否则，返回<xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>, if and only if both the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>’s internal state and the underlying provider's <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref> are open.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>当且仅当<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>的内部状态和基础提供程序的<xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>处于打开状态。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>’s state is open but the provider's <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref> is closed, this property returns <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>的状态为已打开但提供程序的<xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>已关闭，则此属性返回<xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将返回<xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the underlying data source connection that is used by the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供对基础数据源连接由访问<xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> object is closed, the returned data source connection will be closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>对象已关闭，返回的数据源连接将关闭。</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: If it is open, an open data source connection will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果它处于打开状态，将返回打开的数据源连接。

trans-unit.source: If the data source connection information was set, the returned value is always non-null.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置数据源连接信息，返回的值始终为非 null。

trans-unit.source: If there is no data source connection information (for example, if the default constructor was used and no connection string was set afterwards), then a null reference is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有数据源连接信息 （例如，如果使用默认构造函数和任何连接字符串设置之后），则返回空引用。

trans-unit.source: The same data source connection used by the Entity Framework can be shared with other parts of an application.
trans-unit.target: 实体框架使用的同一数据源连接可以与应用程序的其他部分共享。

trans-unit.source: The data source connection is returned as a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection> object from the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Connection%2A> property of <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>, or from the StoreConnection property of <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 作为返回数据源连接<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>对象<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Connection%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>，或从<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> StoreConnection 属性</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext></xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Connection%2A></xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnection"></xref> for the data source connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnection"> </xref>数据源连接。
